channel.title: Projects on Joe Kaufeld
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Joe Kaufeld

item.title: Spiderweb: the Tiny Web Framework
item.description: I realized that, though it’s my day job to use them, I don’t know how web frameworks work. So I wrote one.

item.title: Joplin and Fastmail
item.description: Using Joplin and Fastmail for notes everywhere!

item.title: Gitea Actions, Python, and Debian
item.description: Using Debian runners on the all-new Gitea Actions is great! …Until you want to run Python jobs. Here’s how to fix it!

item.title: USB-C for Fun and... Nah, Just Fun
item.description: The New 3DS has one problem: a proprietary charging cable. Let’s stuff a USB-C port into it instead!

item.title: The Asciiquarium
item.description: What happens when you combine an old TV, a Raspberry Pi, and some ASCII fish? Greatness.
